doc:
Mark Roberts (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Roberts_(actor) 0 Mark Roberts (June 9, 1921 – January 5, 2006) was an American stage, film and television support actor who appeared in over 100 films between 1938 and 1994, according to the Internet Movie Database. Sometimes he was credited as Bob Scott, Robert E. Scott, or Robert Scott. Mark_Roberts ( June_9_,_1921 – January_5_,_2006 ) was an_American_stage , film_and_television_support_actor who appeared in over_100_films between 1938_and_1994 , according to the_Internet_Movie_Database . Sometimes he was_credited as Bob_Scott , Robert_E._Scott , or Robert_Scott .
